pma:database.name: e-learning
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `chitietlop` ( `maLop` int(11) NOT NULL, `maHocSinh` int(11) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `maHocSinh` (`maHocSinh`), KEY `maLop` (`maLop`), CONSTRAINT `chitietlop_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maHocSinh`) REFERENCES `hocsinh` (`maHocSinh`), CONSTRAINT `chitietlop_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`maLop`) REFERENCES `lop` (`maLop`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `de` ( `maDe` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ngayLam` datetime NOT NULL, `hanNop` datetime NOT NULL, `maKhoi` int(11) NOT NULL, `maMonHoc` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`maDe`), KEY `maMonHoc` (`maMonHoc`), KEY `maKhoi` (`maKhoi`), CONSTRAINT `de_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maMonHoc`) REFERENCES `monhoc` (`maMonHoc`), CONSTRAINT `de_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`maKhoi`) REFERENCES `khoi` (`maKhoi`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `giaovien` ( `maGiaoVien` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tenGiaoVien` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `anhDaiDien` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Image/df_user.png', `ngaySinh` date NOT NULL, `diaChi` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `CCCD` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `IDChucVu` int(11) NOT NULL, `maMonHoc` int(11) NOT NULL, `matKhau` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`maGiaoVien`), KEY `maMonHoc` (`maMonHoc`), KEY `IDChucVu` (`IDChucVu`), CONSTRAINT `giaovien_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maMonHoc`) REFERENCES `monhoc` (`maMonHoc`), CONSTRAINT `giaovien_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`IDChucVu`) REFERENCES `chucvu` (`IDChucVu`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `hocsinh` ( `maHocSinh` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tenHocSinh` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `anhDaiDien` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Image/df_user.png', `IDChucVu` int(11) NOT NULL, `ngaySinh` date NOT NULL, `diaChi` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `SDT` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `gioiTinh` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', `matKhau` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'md5()', PRIMARY KEY (`maHocSinh`), UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`), UNIQUE KEY `diaChi` (`diaChi`), UNIQUE KEY `SDT` (`SDT`), KEY `IDChucVu` (`IDChucVu`), CONSTRAINT `hocsinh_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`IDChucVu`) REFERENCES `chucvu` (`IDChucVu`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `lop` ( `maLop` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tenLop` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `siSo` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `maKhoi` int(11) NOT NULL, `maTruong` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`maLop`), KEY `lop_ibfk_1` (`maKhoi`), KEY `lop_ibfk_2` (`maTruong`), CONSTRAINT `lop_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maKhoi`) REFERENCES `khoi` (`maKhoi`), CONSTRAINT `lop_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`maTruong`) REFERENCES `truong` (`maTruong`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `lopdamnhan` ( `maLop` int(11) NOT NULL, `maGiaoVien` int(11) NOT NULL, KEY `maGiaoVien` (`maGiaoVien`), KEY `maLop` (`maLop`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `lopdamnhan_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maGiaoVien`) REFERENCES `giaovien` (`maGiaoVien`), CONSTRAINT `lopdamnhan_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`maLop`) REFERENCES `lop` (`maLop`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `ngạnhangcauhoitracnghiem` ( `maCauHoi` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `maMonHoc` int(11) NOT NULL, `maKhoi` int(11) NOT NULL, `chuong` int(11) NOT NULL, `cauHoi` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `doKho` int(11) NOT NULL, `A` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `B` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `C` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `D` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `dapAn` varchar(250) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `trangThai` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', PRIMARY KEY (`maCauHoi`), KEY `khoaNgoai_maMon` (`maMonHoc`), KEY `khoaNgoai_maKhoi` (`maKhoi`), CONSTRAINT `khoaNgoai_maKhoi` FOREIGN KEY (`maKhoi`) REFERENCES `khoi` (`maKhoi`), CONSTRAINT `khoaNgoai_maMon` FOREIGN KEY (`maMonHoc`) REFERENCES `monhoc` (`maMonHoc`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `truong` ( `maTruong` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tenTruong` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `diaChi` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `maThanhPho` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`maTruong`), KEY `maThanhPho` (`maThanhPho`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `truong_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`maThanhPho`) REFERENCES `thanhpho` (`maThanhPho`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
